Tooltip_IndustricaSteamReactor:
Converts steam into power, when placed above an overheated Alien Containment Unit.
Condensed water is automatically vented out into the ocean.
IndustricaPort_CannotDeconstructConnecte: Cannot deconstruct storage while a pipe is attached to a port.
Tooltip_IndustricaItemPump:
Utility that can pull items from its input container and push them into its output container.
Requires power to function.
Multiple pumps connected in series multiplies effective throughput.
Will not pull that which it cannot insert into the output container.
Tooltip_IndustricaItemPipe:
Pipe capable of transferring items over a distance.
Connectable to ports on item containers or pumps, which are highlighted when using it.
Uses sci-fi technology to ensure it does not get consumed on pipe creation.
